data.name: NEKOPARA OVA Set
data.detailed_description:
NEKOPARA OVA Set

This special DLC set contains both the NEKOPARA Chronicle Artbook and the NEKOPARA OVA Soundtrack

NEKOPARA Chronicle Artbook

This artbook contains the collected illustrated works from the NekoPara series. Spanning 10 years from 2008 to 2017, see how Chocola, Vanilla and the other catgirls of NekoPara have evolved into the lovable catgirls we see now!

Details
  • Length: 210 Pages
  • Includes a list of backers who supported the NEKOPARA OVA Kickstarter Campaign

    NEKOPARA OVA Soundtrack

    The soundtrack features the music from the NEKOPARA OVA including the opening and ending songs.

    Details
  • Contains 26 tracks
  • Opening Theme: Baby→Lady LOVE (Performed by Ray)
  • Ending Theme: ▲MEW▲△MEW△CAKE (Performed byKOTOKO)
  • FLAC format

data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 520 MB available space
  • Sound Card: FLAC decoder required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 520 MB available space
  • Sound Card: FLAC decoder required

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 520 MB available space
  • Sound Card: FLAC decoder required
